cleaned_text: Featured In WHAT I DO I come to empower my patients to find balance and realise their healing potential Having to be endowed with knowledge and skills from multiple ancient healing lineages and modern biomedicine, I find it especially helpful to fuse my specialty of Traditional Chinese Medicine and Acupuncture with other ancient healing and modern medicine to provide exponentially effective solutions for healing. I attract a niche market of patients who come to me to resolve health problems and more importantly, to upkeep their health as a form of lifestyle with me after they regain their balance. ABOUT ME My 18 years of practice has impacted thousands of lives up to this day. I am a practising multidisciplinary TCM doctor in Singapore, but my work goes beyond the mediocre TCM practices. Not only do I hold a Doctorate Degree in Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine, I am a First Class Honours graduate in Biomedical Science, a Yoga teacher, a Reiki, Ayurveda, Bazi and Fengshui Practitioner. My 17 years of practice has impacted thousands of lives up to this day. CONSULTS AND SERVICES WHAT OUR CLIENTS ARE SAYING CORPORATE TALKS AND OVERSEAS ENGAGEMENTS I share my knowledge and expertise internationally with the intention to impact lives throughout the world I hold corporate talks and seminars for various topics regarding Traditional Chinese Medicine and other forms of ancient healing to help the white collars and C suites become aware and manage their health in the right way. I also travel overseas to hospitals, retreat centres, hotel chains for holding consults, treatments and therapies. SHOP I extend my healing and positive energies through the products and arts that I offer. I concoct and customize products that not only heal the body but also nourishes the soul, reaching to all that are near and far. Featured Post How TCM works scientifically Simply put, the insertion of thin needles Into acupoints in the body, which are neurovascular nodes that contain a high concentration of sensory fibers, blood vessels, lymphatic vessels and mast cells, will promote blood flow that will bring everything the body that needs to heal such as oxygen, nutrients, immune substances, hormones, painkillers and anti inflammatories to the area of lesion, hence reducing inflammation at that area. THE RETREAT PROGRAMME The Life Transformation Retreat Program The retreat programme will involve an online or face-to-face consultation with Dr Lim first which involves Traditional Chinese Medicine Pulse Taking and Tongue Reading Diagnosis and Life Chart Reading.
